dct_title_s: Accuratissima principatus Cataloniæ et comitatuum Ruscinonis, et Cerretaniæ descriptio
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Map lacks the statement "Cum privilegio" marking the privilege granted to Wit by the States General in 1688, and which appeared on all subsequent maps. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers.
